{{Wireless embedded system |brand=GL.iNet |model=GL-B1300 |revision=v1.3 |series=AC1300 |asin=B079FJKZV8 |newegg=9SIAFN26U08180 |price=89 |est_release_date=01/2018 |fcc_date=01/19/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=2AFIW-B1300 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4028;IPQ4028, 0VV, NK708848, K070800; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4028;IPQ4028, 0VV, NK708848, K070800; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4028;IPQ4028, 0VV, NK708848, K070800; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;;OpenWrt-deriv; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=GL-B1300-e01 |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |oui=E4:95:6E |oui_eth=E4:95:6E }} {{TagLine|AC1300 Home AC Router}} [[File:1300_intro.jpg|600px]] ----
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
"GL-B1300_V1.3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ==Official Supports== *[https://www.gl-inet.com/b1300/ Product Page] *[https://store.gl-inet.com/products/gl-b1300-home-ac-router Official Shop] *[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official Forum] ==Features== * CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 @717MHz (Quad-core ARM Cortex-A7) * Wi-Fi: 400Mbps (2.4GHz) + 867Mbps (5GHz); Mesh Wi-Fi Network * Flash: 32MB (NOR), RAM: 256MB (DDR3) * Ports: 3x GbE, 1x USB3.0; OS: OpenWrt/LEDE pre-installed ==Images== File:B1300_baord1.jpg |Board File:b1300-router_front.jpg | Buttons File:B1300_ports.jpg | Ports [[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
